content: Oh hey guys I got a really short tip for
you today I was making some small cottages for a recent game and I was
making quite a few of them and I was kind of looking for a way to do a little
bit of floorboard detail but not put a ton of work into it
and I came with a pretty good solution that that kind of simulates floorboards
but it's just very easy to do so in this short tip let's go to the tape and I'll
show you how I did that how I painted that all right so I've got my cottage
tile and you can see I painted it black then I put a coat of burnt umber on it
to give it a dark brown undercoat and I'm going to use a nutmeg Brown to dry
brush on this so I'll use a I'm gonna use a really big brush and load the
brush and then you can kind of pull along that the walls here
okay now what I'm gonna do is pull this gently dry brush it on the tile itself
and you can see it's starting to pull out that corrugation and I when I met
you like I said when I made this tile I turned the corrugation up the more
prominent side of the corrugation because I wanted it to kind of peek out
from this dry brushing you can see there it's kind of like
instant floorboards so this is a really nice quick way to kind of simulate those
floorboards you can do a few pulls very gently you know I cover up what you've
exposed with the floorboards but you can give it some more color going this way
you can also go around the walls and I kind of like this so it's a little light
now and it'll darken up just a bit but it'll still show up very well on this
dark on this dark background boards popping out there exercise of this and
there we go so you can see those really popping out and that's a nice kind of
floorboard technique you could use super quick much quicker than cutting out then
cutting out strips or using popsicle sticks or anything of that nature
still gives a nice effect that's super quick so there we go there's a there's a
quick little way to do wooden floor planks in a building
hey you yeah you back here huh I know it was short but would they expect you're
the short tip watch longer episodes if you want Jesus quit bugging me
hey and make sure you join the forum too much for that oh yeah and have a magical
craft a sick day
